governance.chain: L0 Human → L1 LDS Kernel V1 → L2 Proposer

core.name: SAINT Product Configurator
core.description: GCP product configurator for building envelope assemblies. Engineers select assembly types, configure product layers, validate compatibility, and generate specification-compliant configurations. Integrated with the GCP product catalog, shop drawing pipeline, and warranty system.
core.principle: Valid configurations only. Every product combination validated against compatibility rules, specification requirements, and warranty eligibility before acceptance. No invalid assemblies leave this tool.

dependencies.kernel: SAINT_KERNEL.lds.json — validates all configuration actions, enforces VR-SAINT-001 Product Specification Integrity
dependencies.boundaries: SAINT_BOUNDARIES.lds.json — gcp_engineer configures, gcp_admin configures + manages catalog, sales_rep views catalog, contractor views catalog
dependencies.shell: SAINT_SHELL.lds.json — loads via entity loader into main content area
dependencies.auth: SAINT_AUTH.lds.json — user identity for audit trail
dependencies.shop_drawings: SAINT_SHOP_DRAWINGS.lds.json — configured assemblies feed into shop drawing generation

assembly_configurator.description: Interactive assembly builder. Engineer selects assembly type, then configures each layer with compatible GCP products. System validates compatibility at every step.

configuration_flow.name: Select Assembly Type
configuration_flow.description: Choose the building envelope system to configure

configuration_flow.name: Configure Substrate
configuration_flow.description: Define the substrate the assembly attaches to

configuration_flow.name: Select Products per Layer
configuration_flow.description: For each layer in the assembly, select a GCP product. System shows only compatible products for each layer based on previous selections.

validation.compatibility_check: Each product selection validated against compatibility matrix
validation.substrate_check: Products validated against selected substrate type
validation.completeness_check: All required layers must have product selections

configuration_flow.name: Specify Parameters
configuration_flow.description: Set thickness, coverage area, fire rating, and other assembly-specific parameters

parameter_types.name: climate_zone
parameter_types.description: ASHRAE climate zone for code compliance

parameter_types.name: wind_load
parameter_types.description: Design wind load for cladding attachment

configuration_flow.name: Review & Validate
configuration_flow.description: Complete configuration review with kernel validation. Shows warranty coverage, specification compliance, and estimated material quantities.

outputs.configuration_summary: Full assembly description with all layers and products
outputs.warranty_scope: Warranty coverage for each product and system warranty eligibility
outputs.specification_compliance: CSI spec section mapping and compliance status
outputs.material_estimate: Estimated quantities based on coverage area
outputs.cad_integration: Configuration parameters ready for SAINT_SHOP_DRAWINGS DXF generation

compatibility_engine.description: Product compatibility validation ensures only valid assemblies can be configured

rules.name: Product-to-Product Compatibility
rules.rule: Each product in assembly must be in the compatible_with list of adjacent products
rules.enforcement: Invalid combinations blocked at selection time with explanation

rules.name: Substrate Compatibility
rules.rule: Base layer product must be compatible with selected substrate type
rules.enforcement: Incompatible substrates grayed out or warned

rules.name: Discontinued Product Block
rules.rule: Discontinued products cannot be used in new configurations

rules.name: Warranty System Eligibility
rules.rule: System warranty requires ALL products in assembly to be GCP products from same system
rules.enforcement: VR-SAINT-002 — non-GCP products flagged, system warranty excluded

rules.name: Fire Rating Validation
rules.rule: Fireproofing thickness must meet or exceed required fire rating for specified structural member
rules.enforcement: Insufficient thickness blocked with minimum thickness displayed

rules.name: Climate Zone Compliance
rules.rule: Insulation R-value must meet ASHRAE minimum for specified climate zone
rules.enforcement: Non-compliant configurations warned with code-required minimum

rules.name: Application Temperature Range
rules.rule: Product application temperature ranges must overlap for field installation feasibility

specification_compliance.description: Maps GCP products and assemblies to CSI MasterFormat specification sections for submittal and specification compliance.

submittal_integration.description: Configured assemblies generate submittal data for SAINT_SUBMITTALS entity (Phase 3)

configuration.assembly_type: EIF | AWB | FP | WP | CI | MULTI
configuration.substrate_type: concrete | cmu | steel_stud | wood_frame | structural_steel | metal_deck | gypsum_sheathing | plywood
configuration.layers: array — ordered list of product selections per layer

validation_result.warranty_eligible: boolean — true if full GCP system warranty applies
validation_result.issues: array — any warnings or non-compliance items

material_estimate.items: array — product quantities and estimated costs

product.name: string
product.replacement_product_id: string | null — suggested replacement if discontinued

Get product details with full specifications
Get compatible products for a given product
Submit validated configuration to shop drawing pipeline

react_component.description: Interactive product configurator with step-by-step assembly builder. Product catalog browser with search and filter. Configuration validator with real-time compatibility feedback. Material estimator. All actions validated through kernel before execution.
exports: SAINTProductConfig — main entity component (catalog + configurator + routing)
ProductCatalog — browsable product catalog with search, filter by category/type
ProductDetail — full product specifications, data sheets, compatibility info
AssemblyConfigurator — step-by-step assembly builder with layer-by-layer product selection
CompatibilityMatrix — visual compatibility display between products
ConfigurationValidator — real-time validation with compatibility, warranty, and code compliance feedback
MaterialEstimator — quantity and cost estimation based on coverage area
SavedConfigurations — list of saved configurations per project

views.gcp_engineer: Full access — configure assemblies, validate, estimate, submit to drawings
views.gcp_admin: Full access — all engineer capabilities plus catalog management (add/edit/discontinue products)
views.sales_rep: Read-only catalog — browse products, view specifications, no configuration
views.contractor: Read-only catalog — browse products, view specifications, request product info

react_component.code_reference: Follows TradeOS entity pattern. Self-contained component loaded by SAINTShell entity loader. Compatibility engine runs client-side for instant feedback, kernel validates server-side before persistence.
